response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the time invested in its creation. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $14,000. Should you decide to accept this offer, you will be acquiring not just a product, but a valuable asset that promises to serve you well for years to come. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable item into your possession.", "product_price": 14000}
